subject: Mr. Brandon I am the current CBN Governor. STOP ALL YOUR DEALINGS WITH WHO SO EVER IN ORDER TO RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS.
body:
From The Desk of Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso 
Governor Central Bank of Nigeria 
(CBN) Abuja Nigeria 
+234-7069052305. 
YOUR FUND FINAL RELEASE ORDER ( FFRO ). 
Attn: Mr. Brandon 
Fund Beneficiary, 
Dear Mr. Brandon, I am not Mr. Folashodun Shonubi and also he has been sacked as the acting CBN Governor last back year and no longer with the central bank of Nigeria. 
 
Hence you are hereby mandated to come forward for YOUR FUND FINAL RELEASE ORDER ( FFRO ) and also you should indicate your arrival date if you are coming down here in Abuja personally or we should appoint an attorney on your behalf to represent you and sign all your ORIGINAL HARD COPIES DOCUMENTS of your CONTRACT / INHERITANCE FUNDS to enable us complete and conclude your Payment sum of US$10.5Million transfer into your nominated bank account. 
Hence you will pay for the service charges of the attorney for his service to you and kindly call me so that I will give you more updates over your funds payment. Also forward to me your complete personal details, current telephone number along with your international passport or driver's license for reconfirmation. 
Awaiting for your immediate call and response to this message. 
Best Wishes, 
Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso 
Governor Central Bank of Nigeria 
(CBN) Abuja Nigeria 
234+234-7069052305. 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Saturday, February 03, 2024 at 5:27 AM From: "Brandon" <zb55381@***.com> To: cbnactgovernor@financier.com Subject: Re: FROM :THE DESK OF: MR.FOLASH 
 
Dear Mr. Folashodun Shonubi, 
Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am willing to cooperate fully in order to resolve this matter. 
However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things: 
1. Could you please provide more details about the financial crimes that were committed in the course of my payment? This is the first time I'm hearing about this and it's quite alarming. 
2. You mentioned an amount of money but did not specify exactly how much. Could you please confirm the exact amount that was approved for me? 
3. Regarding the ECONOMIC charge, could you please provide more details about what this fee covers and why it is necessary? 
4. Lastly, could you please explain what you mean by "all financial with you will be completed within banking days otherwise, all with you will be terminated as to prove that you are not the real to this fund as approved."? 
I look forward to your prompt response.
Best wishes, 
Brandon

subject: Re: Mr. Brandon I am the current CBN Governor. STOP ALL YOUR DEALINGS WITH WHO SO EVER IN ORDER TO RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS.
body:
Dear Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am willing to cooperate fully in order to resolve this matter.

However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about the financial crimes that were committed in the course of my payment? This is the first time I'm hearing about this and it's quite alarming.
2. You mentioned an amount of money but did not specify exactly how much. Could you please confirm the exact amount that was approved for me?
3. Regarding the ECONOMIC charge, could you please provide more details about what this fee covers and why it is necessary?
4. Lastly, could you please explain what you mean by "all financial dealings with you will be completed within banking days otherwise, all dealings with you will be terminated as proof that you are not the real beneficiary to this fund as approved."

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Brandon

subject: From The Governor Central Bank of Nigeria
body:
From The Desk of Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso 
Governor Central Bank of Nigeria 
(CBN) Abuja Nigeria 
+234-7069052305. 
YOUR FUND FINAL RELEASE ORDER ( FFRO ). 
Attn: Mr. Brandon 
Fund Beneficiary, 
 
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail and the contents therein were noted also I apologized for the late response to your message. 
 
There was no time me or my office accused you of any financial crimes during the cause of you execurting your contract with the Federal Government of Nigeria.  Yes the exact amount approved to pay you is US$10.5Million and also I do not know of any  ECONOMIC  CHARGES rather you are expected to fly down here in Abuja to personally sign all your ORIGINAL HARD COPIES DOCUMENTS of your CONTRACT / INHERITANCE FUNDS to enable us complete and conclude your Payment sum of US$10.5Million transfer into your nominated bank account without further delay. 
 
But if you can not make it down here due to logistics best known to you, an attorney will be appointed on your behalf to represent you and sign all your ORIGINAL HARD COPIES DOCUMENTS of your CONTRACT and you will pay for his service charges only. 
 
Yes, all financial dealings with you can be terminated if you fail to do the needful in order to receive your over due payment sum of US$10.5Million the fund returns back to the coffin of the Federal Government of Nigeria. 
Awaiting for your immediate call and response to this message. 
Best Wishes, 
Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso 
Governor Central Bank of Nigeria 
(CBN) Abuja Nigeria 
234+234-7069052305. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2024 at 6:35 AM From: "Brandon" <zb55381@***.com> To: dryemicardosocbngovernor@financier.com Subject: Re: Mr. Brandon I am the current CBN Governor. STOP ALL YOUR DEALINGS WITH WHO SO EVER IN ORDER TO RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS. 
 
Dear Dr. Olayemi M. Cardoso, 
Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am willing to cooperate fully in order to resolve this matter. 
However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things: 
1. Could you please provide more details about the financial crimes that were committed in the course of my payment? This is the first time I'm hearing about this and it's quite alarming. 
2. You mentioned an amount of money but did not specify exactly how much. Could you please confirm the exact amount that was approved for me? 
3. Regarding the ECONOMIC charge, could you please provide more details about what this fee covers and why it is necessary? 
4. Lastly, could you please explain what you mean by "all financial dealings with you will be completed within banking days otherwise, all dealings with you will be terminated as proof that you are not the real beneficiary to this fund as approved." 
I look forward to your prompt response.
Best wishes, 
Brandon
